description: Access Ethereum blockchain data effortlessly. Check balances, view transaction history, track token transfers, and fetch contract ABIs with ease. Enhance your Ethereum interactions with real-time gas prices and ENS name resolution.

capabilities.name: check-balance
capabilities.description: Check the ETH balance of an Ethereum address

capabilities.name: get-transactions
capabilities.description: Get recent transactions for an Ethereum address

capabilities.name: get-token-transfers
capabilities.description: Get ERC20 token transfers for an Ethereum address

capabilities.name: get-contract-abi
capabilities.description: Get the ABI for a smart contract

capabilities.name: get-contract-code
capabilities.description: Get the source code for a smart contract

capabilities.name: get-gas-prices
capabilities.description: Get current gas prices in Gwei

capabilities.name: get-ens-name
capabilities.description: Get the ENS name for an Ethereum address
